QuestData.Title: Sandscraper
QuestData.Description: My other assistants are making sure our proud new comrades are put into comfy cages and shipped to where they're needed most. For the Horde. Meanwhile, we've got one last item on our agenda.$B$BSandscraper, the chief of the Dunemaul Clan, is probably too dumb to even be aware of what we're doing here. But I absolutely loathe unfinished business, babe. He's lurking in the den just over there to the west. Knuckle down, take him out, and we'll be good to sign off on this, 'kay?
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's save the chit-chat and whatever else for when we're off the clock here, okay?
QuestData.RewardText: And that's a wrap! Nothing left here for us but sand. Good job, babe.$B$BWell, maybe I shouldn't be so hasty. Did you find anything in that ogre den?
